Tue, 07 Nov 2006 09:34:03 -0600 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C70281.E119234A" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Subject: Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - auction-security.com / 70.84.0.116 Date: Tue, 7 Nov 2006 07:32:05 -0800 Message-ID: <9E6444BEF035C24395AF62A72BBCA02C012CF7A2@hotrod.corp.escrow.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - auction-security.com / 70.84.0.116 Thread-Index: AccCgegj5H4zOwSPQgKJsPlPHNNnFQ== From: "Josh Smith" To: Cc: "ifcc10@ic3.gov" <'ifcc10@ic3.gov'>, "Brandon Abbey" , , "Josh Smith" Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 71.143.242.60 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of escrow.com) client-ip=71.143.242.60; envelope-from=jsmith@escrow.com; helo=hotrod.corp.escrow.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Nov 2006 15:34:08.0000 (UTC) FILETIME=[2A2DD800:01C70282] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Host, It appears you are hosting a fraud site at auction-security.com This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers, Internet Escrow Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC"). It has been brought to our attention that your company provides services to a website, [auction-security.com], which is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com ). This site has stolen content from Escrow.com for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to buy and sell over the Internet. Please disable this site immediately Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the [auction-security.com] site, . Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with [auction-security.com], and has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com. Thank you. Josh Smith Security Team Escrow.com 16251 Laguna Canyon Road Suite 150 Irvine, CA 92618 Toll Free 1.888.511.8600 International 1.949.790.5890 MIME element (text/html) Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - auction-security.com / 70.84.0.116
